products.title: Rimini, Storm Cloud - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini's storm cloud is moody, broody, and full of atmosphere, just as its name might suggest. That said, it's still light enough that it won't black out your room when closed, with some light still able to peer through. Settle the storm cloud amongst paler greys and whites for a modern, monochrome living room, or pair with brick reds, bright oranges, or pale yellows for a cool retro bedroom.

products.title: Rimini, Tangerine - Roller Blind
products.description: Add some summer cheer to any room with the rimini in tangerine. This fruity shade is fun, fresh, and just a little bit retro. And it's such a bright, sunny colour that it will make a great substitute for the sunshine when it's pulled down. Co-ordinate with rich browns and clean whites for a great, unique look in a living room, or pair with other brights, such as limes and yellows, in a kids' bedroom or playroom to create a fun and playful atmosphere.

products.title: Rimini, Ocean - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini's ocean is a deep, intriguing indigo blue, with a mysterious midnight feel to the hue. Its dark shade will certainly keep most of the light out, whilst offering privacy when needed, too. The durability of this no-fuss blind is perfect for a window covering that could get a lot of use. Mix the ocean with pale, icy blues; bright, stark whites; and light, neutral greys. Or, for a striking look, pair with a bright poppy red or a pretty, sunshine yellow.

products.title: Rimini, Jade - Roller Blind
products.description: If fresh and immaculate is the look you're going for, then look no further than the pretty pastel of the rimini roller-blind in jade. It adds a splash of colour without taking over the room or creating too intense a look, and allows just a slip of light to penetrate through. Team this beauty with pastel pinks, colourful florals, and neutral beiges and creams to provide a subtle accent to its complementary hues.

products.title: Rimini, Midnight - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini in midnight is a deep, dark hybrid between navy blue and charcoal grey, making it interesting enough to make a statement, and, though not strictly a blackout blind, still dark enough to work on a practical level in keeping the light out. Blend the midnight amongst pale greys, barely-there blues, and naked whites, or complement deep reds and vivid greens. A great colour for a contemporary home office, or for stopping that sunshine from waking you up in the bedroom.

products.title: Rimini, Wine - Roller Blind
products.description: Rich and opulent, the rimini wine is a shade for the most sophisticated of homes. This splendidly dark blind not only offers privacy when you need it, but also tames even the brightest rays of sunlight. The rimini wine works beautifully with pale neutrals, and makes for a plush, abundant look in a living room or dining room. Pair with light woods and stark whites for a modern look, or with darker woods and warm creams for a more traditional feel.

products.title: Rimini, Apple - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini's apple really is apple green. This perfectly fruity shade is lively and refreshing, and might just have you yearning for a cool glass of apple juice. The durability of the blind makes it a worthwhile investment, with its fuss-free usability and quality finish being added bonuses. Use the apple in the kitchen, paired with pale yellows and crisp whites, for a garden-fresh country feel, or in the bedroom, where the sun peeking through will give you the perfect start to the day.

products.title: Rimini, Terracotta - Roller Blind
products.description: Go traditional with the rimini in terracotta. Reminiscent of beautiful, sunny mediterranean kitchens, this rich, cheerful shade is dark enough to keep too much light out, yet summery enough to brighten your room all year round. Put together with pretty greens and creams for an impressive country kitchen, or with creams walls and dark woods for a classic look in the dining room. Don't forget to add in some other terracotta elsewhere in the room to really bring out the colour of the blind.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Mocha - Roller Blind
products.description: A combination of style and practicality, the rimini (blackout) in mocha is part of a quality collection of blackout roller-blinds. With both easy functionality and a sophisticated brown shade, the mocha will shield against the harsh glare of both daytime and nighttime lights with contemporary colour and modern style. Layer the mocha with sumptuous white linens and contrasting, velvety cloths for an elegant palette with an inviting combination of textures.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Tangerine - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) range offers practical blackout roller-blinds that are easy to use due to their simple rolling mechanism. The tangerine is a favourite for adding a burst of sunny shade and stimulating colour to any room in the home that needs brightening up. Combine the tangerine with a fun and creative contrast of cobalt blue or zesty yellow for a fun palette, matching the orange with eye-catching fabrics and features in alike shades for a striking display of character and a continued funky theme.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Mint - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a highly effective, yet lightweight blackout blind, that also adds a sense of style, freshness, and vitality to your room, the rimini (blackout) in mint could be just what you're looking for. The pretty, subtle green of the mint means that this blind can not only fit in with many existing colour schemes, but is can also create the basis for a gentle, modern dcor style. Try it with darker greens or rich browns in a contemporary living room, or with stark whites in a chic, minimalist kitchen.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Ecru - Roller Blind
products.description: The perfect solution for helping your family getting a good night's sleep, or a relaxing morning lie-in, the rimini (blackout) range is an always popular collection. The ecru edition is a soothing and contemporary blind that is sure to settle into any surrounding. Feature the ecru in your bedroom for restful colour and effortless style, blending with a calm background of ivory or biscuit. Layer the blind with a contrasting, quilted fabric for an elegant frame to an otherwise modern look.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Myrtle - Roller Blind
products.description: Reminiscent of luscious green grass, the rimini (blackout) in myrtle is a stylish dark green blackout blind of the highest quality. The finely textured rimini fabric is lightweight enough to unroll with ease, yet still the ideal choice for keeping the light out to ensure a good night's sleep. The dark green hue of the myrtle contrasts beautifully against dark woods for a traditional, cosy look in a home office, or with lighter woods for a fresh, outdoorsy feel in a contemporary living room.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Terracotta - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is the cause of many a night's disturbed sleep, so opt for the popular rimini (blackout) range in your home. This practical and easy-to-use roller-blind comes in a warming terracotta shade for a punch of colour and character. Use the terracotta in a country-inspired bedroom by framing with fine textured cloth or layers of linen in a warming palette of caramel and mocha. Incorporate similar tones within the rest of the room, as well as checks or woodland prints to finish the look with character and coherency.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Wine - Roller Blind
products.description: One of the most popular ranges, the rimini (blackout) blinds are designed to keep harsh glares and light at bay, and to help you to get the best night's sleep possible. The sophisticated wine edition, in an elegant maroon shade, brings both practicality and style to your window dressing. Match the divine wine with a classy ivory background, creating a refined palette for this rich and demanding burgundy hue.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Storm Cloud - Roller Blind
products.description: A fashionable and modern take on grey or stone, the rimini (blackout) in storm cloud certainly provides one of their must-have colours for the contemporary home. Combine this with a high-quality blackout performance and an easy-rolling fabric, this blind is a simple and functional winner. Why not use the rimini storm cloud in the sitting room to compliment bolder brights in your seating and carpet? Or it would work equally well in a minimalist kitchen or dining room where it can help accentuate a range of features such as tiling, tableware, or fitted cabinets.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in coral is one of those fabrics that's hard to define when you first see it, but you know it has the star quality you've been searching for. The crisp coral pink allows you to introduce vibrant natural colour to any room your heart desires, and to do it in a way that doesn't overdo things. As you search for inspiration, why not combine coral with a dark charcoal? It's a unique colour contrast, but when you see it before your own eyes you'll instantly see what we're talking about.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Peony - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and take one look at trinity blackout peony you come to appreciate just how much work has gone into creating such an elegant colour. It's all about combining half a dozen shades you can't quite put your finger on so that you can find the perfect unifying colour for your new decor. We can't think of anything better than combining peony with similar multi-faceted blues and greens to introduce natural colours with a refined twist.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Peacock - Roller Blind
products.description: Simple and crisp, that's exactly what we thought when we sampled trinity blackout in peacock for the very first time. It's a fabric that sits gently in the background, adding a regal touch to any space you choose to debut it in. When you want to be able to shine a light on a new way of thinking, why not embrace the colourful threads peacock adds to proceedings? Match it to washed out reds and subtly faded greens to create a primary style that will allow you to rest and relax the moment you walk through the door.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Rock - Roller Blind
products.description: Our all-new trinity blackout rock fabric allows you to take your decor in numerous different directions depending on what it is that you want to achieve. It's all about neutral shades with the natural touch, and it's a great way to get truly creative with your interiors. The beauty of rock is that it adds a calming presence to any room, without being too delicate with its choice of colour. This is still a bold and eye-catching fabric.

products.title: Ecowood, Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood's chenille satin is discreet and demure in a matt, creamy white finish. This authentic-looking faux wood is formed from high quality, hardwearing pvc, making it both sturdy, wipe-clean, and water-resistant - and therefore ideal for any family-centred room. Offset a duck egg colour scheme in a contemporary kitchen, setting the chenille satin amidst painted walls and cream or wooden units.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: As you lie back and put your feet up for the evening you want to be able to feel at ease. The beauty of their new trinity blackout dusk fabric is that it catches the magic of this most restful of times of day, and leaves you feeling at peace. Combining dusk with a gentle washed out green is a great way to introduce natural colour to the living room without overdoing things. It's all about creating a relaxing space that you never want to leave, so take your time with it and the answers will appear before your eyes.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Mauve - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the modern aesthetic of trinity blackout mauve because it allows you to take your time, sit back, and take it all in. This is a deep and moody colour that entices you in to take a closer look, and then puts your mind at ease. If you want to be able to add some style to the upstairs landing then why not match your runner to mauve? You could even stagger your photos down the stairs so that you can create a transitory feature wall that follows you as you transition between floors.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Lipstick - Roller Blind
products.description: Decorating is as much about setting existing spaces free of their longstanding constraints as it is about breathing new life into your home. Trinity blackout lipstick adds style and flair to any room in the house, and does it all by staying true to the contemporary colours that you're searching for. When you want to be able to add a real talking point to the dining room there's no better way to do it than by taking lipstick as the starting point.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Canary - Roller Blind
products.description: The thing that first caught their eye when taking in canary from their trinity blackout range is the way in which it illuminates the room. As the yellow shines bright you get a real sense of proportion and scale for the very first time, no matter how compact your chosen space. It's all about introducing balancing colours like sky blue and grassy greens. That way you can capture the essence of natural colour without running the risk of overdoing things.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Fuschia - Roller Blind
products.description: We love trinity blackout in fuschia for a couple of reasons. Firstly, it allows you to drift off into the deep sleep that will leave you feeling rested and relaxed the moment you wake. And secondly, it allows the electricity to flow into the room and enliven any space the instant you lower your blinds. If you love the idea of creating the perfect chill out space, why not add fuschia to the lounge? Add a glass coffee table, matching entertainment unit, and think about other modern touches you can introduce along the way.

products.title: Roma, Scarlet - Roller Blind
products.description: In cosy, eye-catching red, the roma scarlet is no wallflower. As rich in quality as it is in colour, this blind is a must-have for red enthusiasts looking for a durable window covering for their home. Use the scarlet to offset rich cream walls for a cosy look in the living room. Add natural beiges, fellow reds, and even more cream to keep the look simple yet effective, and be sure to add plenty of wood for a wonderfully homely feel.

products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma thunderbird is not a shade to be missed - as in, it simply can't be. Bold and memorable, this blind is almost opaque, yet doesn't block out the light entirely, making for a great compromise. Don't be shy; use the thunderbird as a central feature in your white or cream kitchen, or go bold in the bathroom by opting for a non-traditional colour scheme of red and white. Or you might find that this daring red provides you with all the motivation you need in your home office.

products.title: Roma, Snuff - Roller Blind
products.description: Add some dusky mystery to your home with the roma in snuff. This pretty, distinctive hushed purple shade is a colour all its own, and can create either a subtle or striking look depending on what you do with it. One thing's for sure, its pliable yet durable material means it's easy to use and will stand the test of time. Counter rich, striking purples for a lavish, deluxe vibe in a bedroom, or use against whites and creams in the bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Hot Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma hot pink is a silky blend of pink and purple that will add some heat and spice to your decor in seconds. If you love to be able to walk into a room and feel the love, this is the fabric you've been waiting a lifetime for. We love the idea of pairing hot pink with smouldering reds and sun-kissed oranges to create a light and vibrant atmosphere you'll never want to leave. Get the balance right and you'll know it when you see it.

products.title: Roma, Rose Tint - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma rose tint is as dusky as it is pretty, and its smoky overtones give this pink blind an extra level of style. Roma's simple fabric hangs flawlessly and without fuss, allowing all your focus to be on the attractive pink tone. Team the rose tint with stark whites to add a contemporary feel to this vintage tone. Bright white walls will make the colour pop, whilst this lovely colour scheme will feel relaxed and cheery in a bedroom, living room, or even kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Polar - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma's polar is an icy mint green, verging on turquoise, and is the ideal hue for giving a room a unique, pretty feel. It's crisp, modern tone means that light can still penetrate through, even when closed, so you'll never feel shut in. Beautiful when set against pure white walls, the polar is a great choice for a fresh, airy living room, or a bright utility. The shade will also work well amongst browns and beiges, so don't be afraid to add a splash of colour to your neutral living room or office.

products.title: Roma, Lime - Roller Blind
products.description: There's no getting away from it, the roma's lime is a bright, fun, in-your-face kind of colour. And when trying to make a statement, that's no bad thing. If you're feeling adventurous, or just want to give your dcor a little jumpstart, this could be the window covering for you. As long as you're looking for colour and vibrancy, we can't think of a room this blind won't work in. We particularly love it in a kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Chicory - Roller Blind
products.description: The deep midnight blue of the roma chicory is tranquil yet eye-catching, whilst the canvas it colours is strong and long-lasting, making this the perfect choice for a busy family home and all the hustle and bustle that comes with it. Include the chicory in a teenager's bedroom for a moody atmosphere and team up with pale greys and shimmering silvers to add character and contrast. For younger teens, consider adding a space theme, which will work wonderfully with this deep blue tone.

products.title: Roma, Firefly - Roller Blind
products.description: Take one look at the warm and inviting tone of roma firefly and you instantly feel at home. The luscious powdered orange helps create that warm and cosy feeling all year round, and it does it with the touch of contemporary style you've been waiting for. If you really want to fall in love with your interiors all over again, why not take your decor in a vivid new direction? Some throws over the back of the couches, bold patterns as the backdrop to your feature wall, and of course some bare wood floors.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma's fuscous grey is a neutral, lead shade that's ideal for the modern styled home. The sturdy fabric is great for light control, whilst not entirely blacking out a room. All of their roller-blinds use quality aluminium tubes so they're easy to move - totally fuss-free. Pair with whites and other neutrals for a monochrome look, or with bright yellows or limes for a funky, current style. The perfect blind for a fresh, contemporary office, striking when coupled with light woods, white furniture, and the latest tech.

products.title: Roma, Grey Nickel - Roller Blind
products.description: Halfway between a grey and a beige, the roma roller-blind in grey nickel is the perfect neutral for all kinds of dcor styles. Its hardy fabric offers privacy while still allowing some light to penetrate through. Use amongst pretty florals for some country chic or with plain, but bold colours like royal blues and deep reds for a contemporary style. Grey nickel makes the perfect window accent in a country kitchen or contemporary hallway - or indeed, any style room.

products.title: Roma, Urban - Roller Blind
products.description: In the softest of pale greys, the roma in urban offers an understated neutral to your home. The simple tone is subtle, and the papery feel belies the true strength of the fabric, which will easily last the wear and tear of family life. Use the urban to offset stronger tones, be they deep charcoal greys or bottomless jet blacks for a monochromatic look, or pretty plum and pinky tones for something more colourful.

products.title: Roma, Rodeo Dust - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma's beautiful in beige rodeo dust is the ideal option when looking for a subtle neutral for your home. Firm and durable, this blind is still lightweight enough to allow some light to penetrate and doesn't darken a room too much when closed. This pale shade of brown will work with many different colours, most namely other, darker browns, but also deep reds, dusky purples, and deep navy blues. This is a lovely blind for a dark, moody dining room, a neutral and cream living room, or a calming home office.

products.title: Spectrum, Lima - Venetian Blind
products.description: Let the natural apple green of the spectrum lima light up your home. The lightweight feel, yet sturdy quality, aluminium slats sit neatly and adjust easily, adding workability and function to style and aesthetics in this pretty blind. The muted green of the lima will match browns and creams in equal measure, and can even sit pretty amongst darker forest greens. Use for a lovely, colourful style in the living room, as a standout window feature in the dining room, or as part of a tranquil, calming scheme in the home office.

products.title: Spectrum, Casablanca - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum casablanca comes with just a hint of fruity orange, making it stand out from other shades of yellow. A shiny, gloss finished blind, it comprises of heavy gauge aluminium slats, alongside coordinating cords and rails. The colour-blocking trend doesn't seem to be going away, so take advantage and use the casablanca against bright sky blues, emerald greens, or stark whites in a den, playroom, or dining room.

products.title: Spectrum, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in solitaire brings a barely-there cream with hints of pink or peach, proving that plain doesn't necessarily mean plain. The satin-finish aluminium is strong and durable, and most importantly, guaranteed not to sag. This wipe-clean blind is perfect for a bathroom or kitchen, and the subtle shade will be beautifully complemented by richer peaches or darker pinks, with silver accents providing the finishing touches.

products.title: Spectrum, Magic Mint - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in magic mint offers contemporary style and a beautiful spearmint hue that will suit clean, airy rooms. The satin-finish aluminium is durable and lasting, with matching pull-cords and rails resulting in pure, uninterrupted colour. Offset mocha browns and soft taupes by placing the magic mint in the home office amidst light woods and white soft furnishings for a serene, relaxing feel.

products.title: Spectrum, Christine - Venetian Blind
products.description: Add a hint of citrus to a dim window with the spectrum in christine. This fun, vibrant blind has a satin finish and neatly sitting aluminium slats that can be tilted or moved using matching cords according to how much light you would like in the room. Make the christine pop by hanging in a white kitchen or utility room, with colour-coordinated orange and contrasting lime accessories to bring out the gorgeous orange hue.

products.title: Spectrum, Gossip - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum's gossip is a funky lime green with a gloss finish that adds shine and class to the heavy gauge aluminium. The lime shade offers fun and vivacity, making this a bold and colourful choice. The gossip's bright hue will complement stark whites and other citrus shades, the perfect colour scheme for a teenager's bedroom or the home office. Alternatively, use as a complement to a monochromatic dcor scheme, to add a pop of colour in a black and white dining room or bathroom.

products.title: Spectrum, Mill Brook - Venetian Blind
products.description: Creamy and luxurious, yet not overpowering, spectrum's millbrook is a delicious shade of brown. Its discreet satin finish only serves to promote this look, and this blind will look simply gorgeous with the slats adjusted either up or down. Give your home office an opulent feel that is also relaxing and unobtrusive, by placing against cream or pale taupe walls, and accessorising with the occasional splashes of soft aqua and pale gold.

products.title: Spectrum, Light Wisteria - Venetian Blind
products.description: Add a rosy glow to your home with the spectrum in light wisteria, a pretty, subtle shade of purple with a dusky hue and satin finish. Easily adjustable slats and simple to use pull-cords mean that you can enjoy true practicality in combination with style. A gorgeous shade for either a guest or master bedroom, the light wisteria looks best paired with dainty florals and soft creams, and can be offset beautifully by plush soft furnishings and light and medium coloured woods.

products.title: Spectrum, Thunderbird - Venetian Blind
products.description: A bold, vivid red and a gloss-finish, sturdy aluminium unite to form the spectrum thunderbird, a vibrant and lively venetian blind. The durable slats can be moved up and down, or gently tilted, to suit your needs, and come with a matching pull-cord and rails. The thunderbird will create a modern and animated vibe when paired with stark whites and accenting red accessories in a contemporary living room or dining room.

products.title: Origin, Ultramarine - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin ultra marine is a stand-out blue blind, with a gloss finish on strong aluminium slats. Made from only high quality materials, from the slats right through to the pull-cords, this blind is made for durability and hardiness. Take your bathroom to the seaside by coupling with pale, icy blues and pure, bright whites; or give a plain, neutral hallway or utility room a big splash of dazzling colour, offset by whites and silvers in ornaments, frames, and fittings.

products.title: Origin, Mocha - Venetian Blind
products.description: Creamy and rich, the satin-finish origin mocha is a luxury-lover's dream. Work the adjustable slats to your heart's content, either to let the light in or keep it out, without worrying about over-use, as this durable aluminium blind is built to last. Streamline your kitchen by taking advantage of the mocha's colour-coordinated slats, cords, and rails, and pair with deeper browns or pretty turquoises to craft a refreshing and inspiring colour scheme that your guests won't be able to resist commenting on.
